layout.title: Deni AI
layout.description: Deni AI is a completely free chat app that uses AI models such as o1 and Claude 3.5 Sonnet.
layout.ogDescription: Deni AI is a completely free chat app that uses AI models such as o1 and Claude 3.5 Sonnet.

popupMessages.noConversations: Cannot export because no conversations exist.
popupMessages.importAllSuccess: Refresh the page to see imported conversations.
popupMessages.syncedConversations: Conversations are synchronized with the cloud.
popupMessages.accountDeletionError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
popupMessages.invalidFileFormat: Invalid file format. Please select a valid JSON file.

theme.title: Appearance Theme
theme.description: Change between light theme and dark theme.

account.title: Account Settings
account.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.

privacyMode.title: Privacy Mode
privacyMode.description: Hide your name, email address, and profile image.

sync.title: Sync Conversations
sync.description: Synchronize your conversations with the cloud.

account.authDisabled: Authentication is temporarily disabled or not available in your instance.

data.title: Download Account Data
data.description: You can download all data associated with your account below.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.

reauth.title: Confirm Your Password
reauth.description: For security reasons, please enter your password to continue.
reauth.providerMessage: For security reasons, you'll need to reauthenticate with {provider} to continue.

password.title: Password
password.description: Change your password to keep your account secure.
password.cardDescription: Update your password to a new secure combination.
password.successDescription: Your password has been successfully updated.
password.errorAllFields: Please fill in all password fields.
password.errorPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
password.errorNoUser: You must be logged in to change your password.
password.errorWeakPassword: New password is too weak. Use a stronger password.
password.errorRecentLogin: For security reasons, you need to re-login before changing your password.
password.errorGeneric: Failed to update password. Please try again.
password.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to change your password.
password.notPasswordProvider: You cannot change your password because you signed in with a third-party provider.

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your active sessions and devices.
sessions.activeSessionsDescription: These are the devices where you're currently logged in.

security.title: Security
security.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to change security settings.
security.setupError: Failed to set up 2FA. Please try again.

twoFactor.title: Two-factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
twoFactor.label: Two-factor Authentication
twoFactor.sublabel: Add an extra layer of security to your account

sessions.label: Manage Active Sessions
sessions.sublabel: See all devices where you're currently logged in

reauth.title: Confirm Your Password
reauth.description: For security reasons, please enter your password to continue.
reauth.providerMessage: For security reasons, you'll need to reauthenticate with {provider} to continue.

qrCode.title: Set Up Two-factor Authentication
qrCode.description: Scan this QR code with an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy.
qrCode.manualEntry: Or enter this code manually if you can't scan the QR code:

verify.title: Verify Authentication Code
verify.description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to confirm setup.

security.errorVerifying: Invalid authentication code. Please try again.

dataControls.title: Data Controls
dataControls.description: Manage your data and privacy settings

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Allow collection of usage data to improve the service

export.title: Export/Import Data
export.description: Export all your conversations to a JSON file or import them from a file.

reauth.title: Reauthentication
reauth.description: Enter your password to export or delete data
reauth.providerAuth: Reauthenticate with Google or GitHub to continue deleting data.

deleteData.title: Delete All Conversations
deleteData.description: Permanently delete all your conversation history. This action cannot be undone.
deleteData.confirmDescription: This will permanently delete all your conversation data from your account (if logged in) and local storage.

accountDeletion.title: Delete Account
accountDeletion.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
accountDeletion.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted.

dataControl.title: Data Management
dataControl.description: Manage data stored in Deni AI and locally.
dataControl.importWarning: Note: Importing will delete all existing conversations and replace them.
dataControl.deleteAllDescription: Delete all conversations. This action cannot be undone.

model.title: Manage Models
model.description: Toggle the visibility of models in the chat model list.
model.noModels: No models match your filter criteria. Please adjust your filters.
model.experimentalDescription: Experimental models use experimental API servers that undergo maintenance at irregular intervals. If unavailable, please use release models.

modelSelector.visionRequired: This conversation contains images, so only image-compatible models are available.

footer.disclaimer: AI responses may not always be accurate. All AI models are available for unlimited use.

landing.title: Save Your 20 Dollars
landing.subtitle: A safe AI chat service that is unlimited, completely free, and made for everyone
landing.featuresSubtitle: Next-generation AI chat service with advanced features and ease of use
landing.freeDescription: No subscriptions or hidden fees. All features available for free.
landing.privacyDescription: We respect data security and privacy, protecting your data.
landing.speedDescription: Utilizing the latest technology to provide users with fast responses.
landing.supportDescription: Support for AI is available during support hours.

home.title: How can I help you today?
home.subtitle: Create a new chat or select a conversation from the sidebar on the left to start chatting!
home.clearHistoryConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All chat history will be permanently deleted.

login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your account information to log in.
login.termsAndPrivacy: By logging in to this site, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
login.invalidAuthCode: Invalid authentication code. Please try again.
login.twoFactorDescription: This account has additional protection with two-factor authentication.
login.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please wait and try again later

register.title: Create Account
register.description: Enter your account information to register an account.
register.termsAndPrivacy: By logging in to this site, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
register.emailInUse: This email is already in use

error.occurred: An issue has occurred. If the problem persists after clearing cache and cookies, this model might be offline.
error.shareNotLoggedIn: You need to be logged in to share a conversation
error.shareNoMessages: There are no messages to share
error.retryMessage: Failed to send message. Would you like to retry?

deepResearch.description: Deep Research is in beta. Click on 'Visited websites' to see search results.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occurred in Deni AI.

tryAgain.title: Try again
tryAgain.content: First, try clicking the 'Try again' button to see if the error resolves.

oldChatSession.title: Old chat storage format
oldChatSession.content: This error may occur if you're using an old version from the AI Playground era. This is a common error.
oldChatSession.solution: You can try resolving this by selecting 'Delete session' from the debug menu below to delete the chat.
oldChatSession.warning: â€»Note: Once you delete the chat, it cannot be recovered.

oldCache.title: Using old cache
oldCache.content: Rarely, conflicts may occur if the cache stored in your browser (such as JavaScript files) is not the latest version.
oldCache.solution: This can be resolved by clearing the cache from your browser settings.

otherErrors.title: Other errors
otherErrors.content: If following these steps doesn't resolve the issue, it might be due to a developer error.

steps.step1: Open the debug menu and select 'Check error'

otherErrors.conclusion: By following this method, you can report the error to the developers.

error.checkErrorDescription: This feature is for developer debugging purposes or for reporting to developers. It is recommended to close it otherwise.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or may have been removed.
notFound.checkUrl: Please check that the URL is correct. If you believe this is an error, please contact the administrator.

already.title: You have already completed the setup
already.description: It seems you have already completed the setup. You can run the setup again if you wish.

language.title: Select Language
language.description: Choose the language you want to use in the app.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Set your display name and avatar image.
profile.name: Display Name
profile.avatarHelp: Enter the URL of the image or leave it blank.

email.title: Email Verification
email.description: Please enter your email address for verification.
email.sent: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
email.notVerified: Your email address is not verified.

alert.title: Email Verification Required
alert.description: To use this app, please verify your email address.

reminder.title: Email Verification Reminder
reminder.description: You can verify your email address later in the settings.

start.title: Ready to Go!
start.description: Setup is complete. Let's start chatting!

error.notFound: The shared conversation was not found

shared.noChatsDescription: Be the first to share a conversation!
